content: **the set consist of crochet drops headband in snow and knitted scarf in puddel ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the knitted scarf pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **headband** **size** one-size circumference approx 46 cm / 18 width approx 11 cm / 4 3 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100 g clr no 14 charcoal grey or clr no 7 orange drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l - or the size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/103-37-b---scarf-with-crochet-edge
